mapper.sql:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ID_APPR ASC) LISTNUM , ID_APPR /* 결재ID */ , TP_BIZ /* 업무구분 */ , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID='TP_BIZ' AND CODE=TP_BIZ ) AS TP_BIZ_NAME , ID_BIZ_KEY /* 업무별ID */ , ID_BIZ_KEY_ETC /* 기타업무별ID */ , TP_APPR /* 결재종류 */ , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID='TP_APPR' AND CODE=TP_APPR ) AS TP_APPR_NAME , DS_TITLE_APPR /* 결재제목 */ , DS_APPR /* 결재내용 */ , DS_APPR_TEMP /* 임시결재내용 */ , TO_CHAR(DT_SUBMIT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DT_SUBMIT /* 상신일시 */ , ID_EMP_SUBMIT /* 상신자 */ , NM_EMP_SUBMIT /* 상신자명 */ , TP_STATUS_APPR /* 결재상태 */ , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID='TP_STATUS_APPR' AND CODE=TP_STATUS_APPR ) AS TP_STATUS_APPR_NAME , TO_CHAR(DT_APPR,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DT_APPR /* 결재일시 */ , DT_END_APPR /* 결재시한 */ , FG_DEL /* 삭제여부 */
FROM TBS_APPROVAL WHERE 1=1 AND ID_EMP_SUBMIT=#{user.id}
AND DT_SUBMIT >= TO_DATE (#{DT_SUBMIT_START} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(from) */
AND DT_SUBMIT <= TO_DATE (#{DT_SUBMIT_END} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(to) */
AND TP_STATUS_APPR = #{TP_STATUS_APPR} /* 결재상태검색 */
ORDER BY LISTNUM DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT ID_APPR , TP_BIZ , ID_BIZ_KEY , ID_BIZ_KEY_ETC , TP_APPR , DS_TITLE_APPR , DS_APPR , DS_APPR_TEMP , TO_CHAR(DT_SUBMIT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_SUBMIT , ID_EMP_SUBMIT , NM_EMP_SUBMIT , TP_STATUS_APPR AS TP_STATUS , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID='TP_STATUS_APPR' AND CODE=TP_STATUS_APPR ) AS TP_STATUS_APPR , TO_CHAR(DT_APPR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_APPR , DT_END_APPR , FG_DEL
FROM TBS_APPROVAL, SYS_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR}

SELECT SEQ_APPR , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE=CD_DUTY AND CODE_CATEGORY_ID='CD_DUTY') AS CD_DUTY , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SYS_USER WHERE USER_ID=ID_EMP_APPR) AS ID_EMP_APPR , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID='TP_APPR_PROC' AND CODE=TP_APPR_PROC ) AS TP_APPR_PROC , DS_COMMENT , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID=ID_DEPT) AS ID_DEPT
, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DEPT_ID_UP FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID=ID_DEPT)) AS ID_DEPT_UP , TO_CHAR(DT_ACT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DT_ACT
FROM TBS_APPROVAL_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR} ORDER BY SEQ_APPR ASC

SELECT USER_ID , USER_NM , DEPT_ID , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID=#{user.partCode}) AS DEPT_NM , POSITION_CD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE=#{user.positionCode} AND CODE_CATEGORY_ID='POSITION_CD') AS CODE_NAME , DUTY_CD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE=#{user.dutyCode} AND CODE_CATEGORY_ID='CD_DUTY') AS DUTY_NM FROM SYS_USER WHERE USER_ID=#{user.id}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBS_APPROVAL_DTL SET DT_ARRIVAL=SYSDATE , DT_ACT=SYSDATE , TP_APPR_PROC='01' , DS_COMMENT=#{DS_COMMENT} WHERE ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR} AND SEQ_APPR=1
UPDATE TBS_APPROVAL_DTL SET DT_ARRIVAL=SYSDATE , FG_USE='Y' WHERE ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR} AND SEQ_APPR=2
mapper.sql:
SELECT TA.ID_APPR AS ID_APPR , TA.TP_BIZ AS TP_BIZ , TA.DS_TITLE_APPR AS DS_TITLE_APPR , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TP_APPR_PROC=CODE AND CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'TP_APPR_PROC') AS TP_APPR_PROC , TA.ID_EMP_SUBMIT AS ID_EMP_SUBMIT , TA.NM_EMP_SUBMIT AS NM_EMP_SUBMIT , TO_CHAR(TAD.DT_ACT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DT_ACT , TO_CHAR(TA.DT_SUBMIT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DT_SUBMIT , SU.USER_NM AS APPR_NM , ID_APPR_DTL , SEQ_APPR AS SEQ_APPR , FG_USE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DT_ARRIVAL ASC) ROW_NUM FROM TBS_APPROVAL TA JOIN TBS_APPROVAL_DTL TAD ON TA.ID_APPR = TAD.ID_APPR JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SU.USER_ID = TAD.ID_EMP_APPR WHERE ID_EMP_APPR=#{user.id} AND FG_USE='Y' AND TP_STATUS_APPR!='04'
AND DT_ACT >= TO_DATE (#{DT_ACT_START} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND DT_ACT <= TO_DATE (#{DT_ACT_END} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND DT_SUBMIT >= TO_DATE (#{DT_SUBMIT_START} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND DT_SUBMIT <= TO_DATE (#{DT_SUBMIT_END} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND TP_APPR_PROC = #{TP_APPR_PROC}
AND DS_TITLE_APPR LIKE '%' || #{DS_TITLE_APPR} || '%'
ORDER BY ROW_NUM DESC
mapper.select: SELECT TA.ID_APPR as ID_APPR , TA.TP_BIZ as TP_BIZ , TA.ID_BIZ_KEY AS ID_VOC , TA.ID_BIZ_KEY_ETC AS ID_SUB_VOC , TA.DS_TITLE_APPR as DS_TITLE_APPR , TAD.TP_APPR_PROC as TP_APPR_PROC , TA.ID_EMP_SUBMIT as ID_EMP_SUBMIT , TA.NM_EMP_SUBMIT as NM_EMP_SUBMIT , TAD.DT_ARRIVAL as DT_ARRIVAL , TA.DT_SUBMIT as DT_SUBMIT , SU.USER_NM as APPR_NM , TA.DS_APPR , TAD.DS_COMMENT , TAD.ID_APPR_DTL , TAD.SEQ_APPR , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TP_APPR_PROC=CODE AND code_category_id = 'TP_APPR_PROC') as TP_APPR_PROC_NAME FROM TBS_APPROVAL TA JOIN SYS_CODE SC ON TA.TP_APPR = SC.CODE JOIN TBS_APPROVAL_DTL TAD ON TA.ID_APPR = TAD.ID_APPR JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SU.USER_ID = TAD.id_emp_appr WHERE SC.CODE_CATEGORY_ID='TP_APPR_PROC' AND TAD.ID_APPR_DTL=#{ID_APPR_DTL}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBS_APPROVAL SET TP_STATUS_APPR='03' , DT_APPR=SYSDATE WHERE ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(ID_APPR),0) AS CNT_APPR FROM TBS_APPROVAL_DTL WHERE ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR} AND TP_APPR_LINE != '03'
SELECT ID_EMP_APPR FROM TBS_APPROVAL_DTL WHERE SEQ_APPR=#{SEQ_APPR}+1 AND ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBS_APPROVAL_DTL SET FG_USE = 'Y' , DT_ARRIVAL = SYSDATE , ID_EMP_UPT = #{user.id} , ID_DEPT_UPT = #{user.partCode} , DT_UPT = SYSDATE , DT_ACT = SYSDATE WHERE SEQ_APPR=#{SEQ_APPR}+1
mapper.select: SELECT TA.ID_APPR as ID_APPR , TAD.ID_APPR_DTL as ID_APPR_DTL , TAD.SEQ_APPR as SEQ_APPR , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID='CD_DUTY' AND CODE=CD_DUTY) as CD_DUTY , SU.USER_NM as ID_EMP_APPR , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TP_APPR_PROC=CODE AND CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'TP_APPR_PROC') as TP_APPR_PROC , TAD.DS_COMMENT as DS_COMMENT , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID=ID_DEPT) as ID_DEPT , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DEPT_ID_UP FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID=ID_DEPT)) AS ID_DEPT_UP , TO_CHAR(TAD.DT_ACT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as DT_ACT FROM TBS_APPROVAL TA JOIN TBS_APPROVAL_DTL TAD ON TA.ID_APPR = TAD.ID_APPR JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SU.USER_ID = TAD.id_emp_appr WHERE TA.ID_APPR=#{ID_APPR} ORDER BY TAD.SEQ_APPR

SELECT ID_APPR_LINE /* 결재선ID*/ , TP_APPR /* 결재종류*/ , TP_BIZ /* 업무구분*/ , ID_BIZ_KEY /* 업무별ID*/ , NM_APPR_LINE /* 결재선명*/ , FG_USE /* 사용여부*/ , DS_REMARK /* 비고*/ , FG_DEL /* 삭제여부*/ , ID_EMP_REG /* 최초등록직원*/ , ID_DEPT_REG /* 최초등록부서*/ , TO_CHAR(DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_REG /* 최초등록일시*/ , ID_EMP_UPT /* 최근수정직원*/ , ID_DEPT_UPT /* 최근수정부서*/ , DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시*/ FROM TBS_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE ID_EMP_REG=#{user.id} /* 최초등록직원*/ AND FG_DEL='N' /* 진행상태 */ AND NM_APPR_LINE LIKE '%' || #{NM_APPR_LINE} || '%'
AND DT_REG >= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_START} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(FROM) */
AND DT_REG <= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_END} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(TO) */
ORDER BY DT_REG DESC

SELECT TAL.ID_APPR_LINE /* 결재선ID*/ , TAL.TP_APPR /* 결재종류*/ , TAL.TP_BIZ /* 업무구분*/ , TAL.ID_BIZ_KEY /* 업무별ID*/ , TAL.NM_APPR_LINE /* 결재선명*/ , TAL.FG_USE /* 사용여부*/ , TAL.DS_REMARK /* 비고*/ , TAL.FG_DEL /* 삭제여부*/ , TAL.ID_EMP_REG /* 최초등록직원*/ , TAL.ID_DEPT_REG /* 최초등록부서*/ , TO_CHAR(TAL.DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_REG /* 최초등록일시*/ , TAL.ID_EMP_UPT /* 최근수정직원*/ , TAL.ID_DEPT_UPT /* 최근수정부서*/ , TAL.DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시*/ , TALD.ID_APPR_LINE_DTL , TALD.TP_APPR_LINE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'TP_APPR_LINE' AND CODE = '02') TP_APPR_LINE_NM , TALD.SEQ_APPR , TALD.ID_EMP , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SYS_USER WHERE USER_ID=TALD.ID_EMP) AS NM_EMP , TALD.CD_LEVEL , TALD.CD_DUTY DUTY_CD , TALD.ID_DEPT , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID = TALD.ID_DEPT) AS NM_DEPT , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_DUTY' AND CODE = TALD.CD_DUTY) AS DUTY_NM FROM TBS_APPROVAL_LINE TAL LEFT OUTER JOIN TBS_APPROVAL_LINE_DTL TALD ON TAL.ID_APPR_LINE=TALD.ID_APPR_LINE WHERE TAL.ID_APPR_LINE= #{ID_APPR_LINE} ORDER BY TALD.SEQ_APPR ASC
